```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(moments)
library(shiny)

    eval = TRUE,
    include = TRUE,
    collapse = TRUE,
    echo = FALSE,
    results = 'markup',
    error = TRUE,
    message = TRUE,
    warning = TRUE,
    comment = '##',
    highlight = TRUE,
    prompt = FALSE,
    strip.white = TRUE,
    tidy = TRUE
    )
theme_update(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```
